com.fujitsu.xml.xpointer.location
Interface Point

All Superinterfaces:
Location
public interface Point
extends Location

Interface that provides point location information.

Fields inherited from interface com.fujitsu.xml.xpointer.location.Location
NODE_LOCATION, POINT_LOCATION, RANGE_LOCATION, UNKNOWN_LOCATION

Method Detail

equals

public boolean equals(Point src)
A point location information comparison result is returned.
The result of the comparison to see if the same location information is indicated by the argument is returned.
Actually, the index value and container node are compared.
Parameters:
src - Point location information to be compared.
Returns:
"true" is returned when the same location information is indicated by the argument.
Otherwise, "false" is returned

isCharacterPoint

public boolean isCharacterPoint()
Whether this point location information is about a character point is judged.
Returns:
"true" is returned when it is judged to be about a character point: otherwise, "false" is returned.

getContainer

public Node getContainer()
The container node is obtained.
Returns:
The container node is returned.

getIndex

public int getIndex()
The index is obtained.
Returns:
The index is returned.
